Barry::vLateSmartPtr

Barry::vLateSmartPtr< T, FreeFuncPtrT > Class Template Reference

#include <vsmartptr.h>

[legend]

List of all members.

Detailed Description

template<class T, class FreeFuncPtrT>
class Barry::vLateSmartPtr< T, FreeFuncPtrT >

Variation of the above smart pointer that allows the user to assign a free function after construction, in the case of dlopen()'d frees.
